channel.title: Europe on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Europe on FinanClub

item.title: SLB
item.description: score:-43 Chances: Schlumberger is strategically investing in natural gas projects in Europe, aiming to enhance energy security while transitioning to renewable energy sources. US Treasury yields saw a significant decline towards the end of 2023, leading to a massive surge in the last two months of the year for US stocks.

item.title: AZN
item.description: score:-135 Chances: AstraZeneca (AZN) closed at $65.95, indicating a +1.77% shift from the previous trading day. AstraZeneca (AZN) announces that it is buying vaccine company, Icosavax. The additional supply of RSV shot for infants by AstraZeneca and Sanofi indicates a positive outlook for meeting winter demand.
